name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Bernard Dale KELLEY, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Bernard Dale KELLEY, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of December 2001, the petition for allowance of appeal is granted, limited to the issue of whether evidence of digital penetration can sustain a charge of sexual assault where said charge required proof of sexual intercourse or deviate sexual intercourse.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
785 A.2d 993
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Bernard Dale KELLEY, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 11, 2001.
